comment.author: 22278697@N02
comment._content: This is a photo of the old round house. It is long since been torn down. All that remans is the turn table.

comment.author: 9138803@N08
comment._content: Excellent view of the main erecting floor and overhead traveling crane inside the 40th street shops- even though Metra still uses 40th Street for servicing locos, this shop has been demolished.
